about_the_game:
Voidborne Onslaught is the Faction Box for starting your Voidborne Army – or adding some reinforcements to your existing Voidborne collection. This is a great +300% value bundle of Voidborne Minions, including the massive Legendary Colossus as well as 2 exclusive Voidborne cosmetics.

Includes:

  • 3x Colossus (Legendary)
  • 5x Succubus (Supreme)
  • 20x Rammer
  • 40x Nether Bat
  • 40x Morgrul's Ragers
  • 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
  • 1x Legendary Faction Box exclusive Voidborne Avatar - Animated Colossus!
  • 1x Legendary Faction Box exclusive Voidborne Emote - Animated Doompuffer!

The Voidborne faction is aggressive with high speed and dark magic. With this Faction Box, you can immediately experiment with the "Voidborne Wound" mechanic using "Morgrul’s Ragers" which makes your minions stronger if any of your Voidborne Minions wounded the opponent.
detailed_description:
Voidborne Onslaught is the Faction Box for starting your Voidborne Army – or adding some reinforcements to your existing Voidborne collection. This is a great +300% value bundle of Voidborne Minions, including the massive Legendary Colossus as well as 2 exclusive Voidborne cosmetics.

Includes:

  • 3x Colossus (Legendary)
  • 5x Succubus (Supreme)
  • 20x Rammer
  • 40x Nether Bat
  • 40x Morgrul's Ragers
  • 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
  • 1x Legendary Faction Box exclusive Voidborne Avatar - Animated Colossus!
  • 1x Legendary Faction Box exclusive Voidborne Emote - Animated Doompuffer!

The Voidborne faction is aggressive with high speed and dark magic. With this Faction Box, you can immediately experiment with the "Voidborne Wound" mechanic using "Morgrul’s Ragers" which makes your minions stronger if any of your Voidborne Minions wounded the opponent.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12.4+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

name: Minion Masters - Voidborne Onslaught

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 240 or equivalent, minimum 512 MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Voidborne Onslaught is a Faction Box and the ideal starting point for your Voidborne Army – or a fantastic way to add reinforcements to your existing Voidborne collection – this is a great +300% value bundle of Voidborne Minions.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
